## ic

Inventory Client

### Options

```
  -i, --interactive string   Run in interactive mode. One of (yes|no|auto) (default "auto")
  -l, --log-level string     Set log level (default "info")
  -s, --server string        URL for the inventory server. (default "http://localhost:8086")
  -h, --help                 help for ic
```
